title: 08/27: Rankings Adjustments and More from the Weekend (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Who's moving up or down in the rankings after Preseason Week 3? We'll tell you what you need to know beginning with some "Hey, Real Quick" (4:40) with Adrian Peterson vs. Kerryon Johnson, Keelan Cole vs. D.J. Moore, Peyton Barber vs. Tevin Coleman and more ... Rankings risers (15:00) including Christian McCaffrey, Kenyan Drake and Eric Ebron. Rankings fallers (27:15) including Kerryon Johnson, Randall Cobb and DeMaryius Thomas ... Thoughts on Josh Gordon (34:01), Worryometer (36:24) for Derrick Henry, Joe Mixon and a few others, some random Fantasy questions (43:18) and a recap of each Week 3 game (46:22) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
This episode is sponsored by www.ZipRecruiter.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
